mapper.update:
update company_intent
company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
member_id = #{memberId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
intent_type = #{intentType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
first_init_time = #{firstInitTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
exec_time = #{execTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
exec_uid = #{execUid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
init_count = #{initCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
intent_state = #{intentState,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where intent_id = #{intentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update company_intent set company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, member_id = #{memberId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, intent_type = #{intentType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, first_init_time = #{firstInitTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, exec_time = #{execTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, exec_uid = #{execUid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, init_count = #{initCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, intent_state = #{intentState,jdbcType=INTEGER} where intent_id = #{intentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
